data.title: About us
data.description: SNAIT is a website that provides resources and support for Somali tech professionals. The site aims to empower Somalis to build successful businesses and careers in the tech industry. üëç

data.title: Our Values
data.description: We believe in the power of community, collaboration, and sharing. We are committed to providing a space for Somalis to connect, learn from each other, and thrive in the tech industry.
